entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
